fields.title: Morning Yoga Flow
fields.description: Start your day with gentle stretches and mindful breathing. Ideal for all levels.

fields.title: Strength & Conditioning
fields.description: A full-body workout combining resistance and cardio to improve strength and endurance.

fields.title: Zumba Dance Party
fields.description: Burn calories with this high-energy dance workout set to Latin and world rhythms.

fields.title: Powerlifting Basics
fields.description: Learn proper form for squat, bench, and deadlift. Perfect for beginners.

fields.title: Indoor Cycling Express
fields.description: A fast-paced 30-minute ride to improve cardiovascular endurance.

fields.title: Restorative Yin Yoga
fields.description: Deep relaxation with long-held passive poses. Suitable for recovery and stress relief.

fields.title: Functional Core Training
fields.description: Strengthen your abs, obliques, and back with bodyweight and resistance tools.

fields.title: Kickboxing Conditioning
fields.description: A cardio-heavy class with punches, kicks, and combos to boost power and stamina.

fields.title: HIIT & Mobility Fusion
fields.description: Combines high-intensity intervals with mobility work for a balanced workout.

fields.title: Mindful Movement & Meditation
fields.description: Gentle movement followed by guided meditation. Ideal for winding down.

fields.title: Pilates Core Strength
fields.description: Focus on strengthening the core muscles through controlled Pilates exercises.

fields.title: Boxing Fundamentals
fields.description: Learn the basics of boxing technique, footwork, and defensive skills.

fields.title: TRX Suspension Training
fields.description: Use suspension straps for a total-body strength and stability workout.

fields.title: Barre Sculpt
fields.description: A low-impact workout combining ballet, Pilates, and yoga techniques to tone muscles.

fields.title: Circuit Training Blast
fields.description: High-intensity circuit training to improve strength and cardiovascular fitness.

fields.title: Aqua Fitness
fields.description: Low-impact water-based exercises ideal for joint health and overall fitness.

fields.title: Bootcamp Challenge
fields.description: An intense outdoor bootcamp designed to build endurance, strength, and agility.

fields.title: Tai Chi for Beginners
fields.description: Learn the slow, flowing movements of Tai Chi to improve balance and relaxation.

fields.title: Advanced HIIT
fields.description: A challenging high-intensity interval training session for experienced participants.

fields.title: Prenatal Yoga
fields.description: Gentle yoga classes tailored for expecting mothers to increase comfort and flexibility.
